verses.text: \w Oh|strong="H3863"\w* that thou wouldest \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, that thou wouldest come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, that the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* might flow \w down|strong="H2151"\w* at thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*,

As \add when\add* the \w melting|strong="H2003"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w burneth|strong="H6919"\w*, the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* causeth the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* to \w boil|strong="H1158"\w*, to make thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to thine \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, \add that\add* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* may \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w* at thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*!\f + \fr 64.2 \ft the melting…: Heb. the fire of meltings\f*

When thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* terrible \w things|strong="H3372"\w* \add which\add* we \w looked|strong="H6960"\w* not for, thou camest \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* flowed \w down|strong="H2151"\w* at thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

For since the beginning of the \w world|strong="H5769"\w* \add men\add* have not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, nor perceived by the \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, neither hath the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* thee, \add what\add* he hath \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* for him that \w waiteth|strong="H2442"\w* for him.\f + \fr 64.4 \ft seen…: or, seen a God beside thee, which doeth so for him, etc\f*

Thou \w meetest|strong="H6293"\w* him that \w rejoiceth|strong="H7797"\w* and \w worketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \add those that\add* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee in thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: behold, thou art \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*; for we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: in those is \w continuance|strong="H5769"\w*, and we shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.

But we are all as an \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add thing\add*, and all our \w righteousnesses|strong="H6666"\w* \add are\add* as \w filthy|strong="H5708"\w* \w rags|strong="H0899"\w*; and we all do \w fade|strong="H5034"\w* as a \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w*; and our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, like the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, have taken us \w away|strong="H5375"\w*.

And \add there is\add* none that \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* upon thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, that stirreth \w up|strong="H5782"\w* himself to take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of thee: for thou hast \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from us, and hast \w consumed|strong="H4127"\w* us, \w because|strong="H3027"\w* of our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 64.7 \ft consumed: Heb. melted\f*\f + \fr 64.7 \ft because: Heb. by the hand\f*

But now, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou \add art\add* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; we \add are\add* the \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*, and thou our \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*; and we all \add are\add* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

¶ Be not \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* very \w sore|strong="H3966"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, neither \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: behold, \w see|strong="H5027"\w*, we beseech thee, we \add are\add* all thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* are a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* is a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*.

Our \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* and our \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, where our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* thee, is burned \w up|strong="H8316"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and all our pleasant \w things|strong="H4261"\w* are laid \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*.

Wilt thou \w refrain|strong="H0662"\w* thyself for these \add things\add*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? wilt thou hold thy \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*, and \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* us very \w sore|strong="H3966"\w*?
